|cpu1_cores = |cpu1_type = |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 400 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Intel;JS28F256J3D75; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = SK hynix;HY5DU561622ETP-D43; |ram1_num = 8 |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8110; |eth3chip = Realtek;RTL8110; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = RedBoot;;; |stockos = Linux;2.6;; |exp_if_types = Mini PCI, USB 2.0, SATA |exp_minipci_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_sata_num = 4 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.5 |pwr_conn = AC (direct) |serial = yes |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = fan, RTC w/ battery backup, |addchip = 4-port PCI-X to Serial ATA Controller;Intel;IQ31244;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none |defaulip = 192.168.0.101 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = storage |manuf = Lanner |manuf_model = EM-7210 |manuf_rev = v0.2B (T04) |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Debian |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 06/2006 |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = Taiwan |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *'''Intel Entry Storage System SS4000-E''' - 4-bay 3.5" HDD NAS :CPU: [[Intel XScale]] 80219 @400MHz ([https://www.ixbt.com/storage/intel-ss4000/is-board.jpg main board]) RAM is via DDR DIMM socket which can be upgraded to a 512MB DIMM. {{see also|Thecus NAS N2100}} Lanner EM7210 board - SS4000E (Baxter Creek) NAS appliance 
MACHINE_START(EM7210, "Lanner EM7210")
	.phys_io	= IQ31244_UART,
	.io_pg_offst	= ((IQ31244_UART) >> 18) & 0xfffc,
	.boot_params	= 0xa0000100,
	.map_io		= em7210_map_io,
	.init_irq	= iop32x_init_irq,
	.timer		= &em7210_timer,
	.init_machine	= em7210_init_machine,
MACHINE_END
